body_html:
In tensorflow.slim implementation of conv_transpose, I find that output_shape can be calculated by this:

from tensorflow.python.layers import utils
out_H = utils.deconv_output_length(in_H, ksize, padding, stride)
out_W = utils.deconv_output_length(in_W, ksize, padding, stride)
body_text:
In tensorflow.slim implementation of conv_transpose, I find that output_shape can be calculated by this:
from tensorflow.python.layers import utils
out_H = utils.deconv_output_length(in_H, ksize, padding, stride)
out_W = utils.deconv_output_length(in_W, ksize, padding, stride)
body:
In tensorflow.slim implementation of conv_transpose, I find that output_shape can be calculated by this:
```
from tensorflow.python.layers import utils
out_H = utils.deconv_output_length(in_H, ksize, padding, stride)
out_W = utils.deconv_output_length(in_W, ksize, padding, stride)
```
